text: Ara musa yakhana krud'dha o ksud'dha haye nija sampradayera kache phire asalena takhana balalena, ‘amara anupasthitite tomara amara kata nikrsta pratinidhitba karecha! Tomadera rabera adesera age'i tomara tarahuro karale? Ebam tini phalakagulo phele dilena [1] ara tara bha'ike cule dhare nijera dike tene anate lagalena. Haruna balalena, ‘he amara sahodara! Lokera to amake durbala mane karechila ebam amake praya hatya kare'i phelechila. Sutaram tumi amara sathe emana karabe na yate satrura anandita haya ebam amake yalimadera antarbhukta karabe na.’
